title: I have $25 of RP!!!! What to spend it on?
body: Hi! Since it's my birthday, a good friend of mine got me $25 of RP. I've never had RP before and I feel so powerful >:). But what to spend the RP on? Leave your suggestions!

replies.body:
Find something you really want and use it on that, since it's only $25. I remember getting my first amount of RP. I loved Nautlus at the time, I spent days staying up watching videos of people playing him and I had my heart set on him so once I was able to play I instantly bought him and AstroNautilus.
Kid you not, I played one game realized how garbage I was, and refunded him. 2/3 refunds used. Trust me, you want to save it.

I would buy champs on sale, or skins on sale.

$25 won't buy much at full price, but you can get a lot if you are patient.
Save it until Riot releases a skin that you love for a champion you love.

Probably runepages
it's so nice having more than 2 runepages to play around with
Buy me a new Karma skin ;)
